content:
#  Faculty of Physics and Applied Computer Science -- Faculty of Physics and Applied Computer Science 

URL: https://www.fis.agh.edu.pl/en/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:08

The results of the Perspektywy 2024 Ranking of Higher Education Institutions and Study Programs have been announced, evaluating study programs offered by Polish universities. The ranking considers factors such as university prestige, graduates' career paths, academic potential, teaching capabilities (accreditations and high school exam scores of admitted students), scientific potential (publications of academic staff in the top 10% prestigious journals, citations), and internationalization.

AGH University of Science and Technology's Technical Physics program has consistently held the first place in the ranking of engineering studies 
 for 
 years.

The full ranking list can be found here 
https://2024.ranking.perspektywy.pl/
